title: Aluminium phosphide (Al12P12) nanocage as a potential sensor for volatile organic compounds: A DFT study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13915-13925
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01828A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mahmoud A. A. Ibrahim, Manar H. A. Hamad, Nayra A. M. Moussa, Omar H. Abd-Elkader, Shaban R. M. Sayed, Muhammad Naeem Ahmed, Ahmed M. Awad, Tamer Shoeib
The potentiality of the aluminium phosphide (Al12P12) nanocage as a prospective sensor material towards methanol (MeOH) and ethanol (EtOH) molecules was investigated using density functional theory computations.
